name: Shell Tactic
description:
Description  

2 players versus game, with tanks, 8 maps, and upgrades, to spice up the battle.
Blow away the destructible battlefield, and the winner!  

Controls  

Player 1: Arrows, Shoot with `m`  
Player 2: ESDF, Shoot with `q` 

See more in the `Help` menu in-game.  

General Idea  

Create and oldschool game, resembling Battle City, but with local pvp in focus.

Health, and Pickups

Each player has health, ammo and shields! Upgrade your tower to do more damage, and destroy the map, to gain more access to your enemy!

Work in progress, still may have some errors.
